name: Notum Saturated Metaplast Armor

items.alias: Etched Pattern for Notum Saturated Metaplast Breastplate

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Notum Saturated Metaplast Shell" "163355" #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Hard Armor)" "162221" or #L "Screwdriver" "150922" HSR - Sketch and Etch (ex:#L "HSR - Sketch and Etch - Chestpiece" "162290") #L "Mass Relocating Robot" "155592" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Hard Armor) + Mass Relocating Robot = #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor)" "162218" Skills: | 2.5EE,2.5ME,2.5NP | ------------------------------ Notum Saturated Metaplast Shell + HSR - Sketch and Etch - Chestpiece = #L "Etched Pattern for Notum Saturated Metaplast Breastplate" "163361" Skills: | CH | ------------------------------ Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor) + Etched Pattern for Notum Saturated Metaplast Breastplate = #L "Notum Saturated Metaplast Breastplate" "163343" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Nano Technician wear only. Notum Saturated Metaplast Shells can be seldom found on Digglets, Moles, Scooplets or Shovelets, underground low level mobs. It's an interesting armor to make. Unfortunately the PPPE is incredibly expensive. You can use a Screwdriver instead of a Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor) but the skills required for the process will be much higher !!
